main event: An unidentified flying object was observed over the Midwestern United States on November 8, 1960.
interesting points: The object was described as circular in shape and approximately 20-30 feet in diameter.,Witnesses reported the object exhibiting rapid changes in color, from red to white to green.,Sightings occurred in an area under careful observation by multiple credible sources.,The object moved erratically and changed direction quickly.,No sound was detected during the sightings.
sighted object: circular, disc-shaped object emitting bright light
witness description: a 29-year-old male, driving west on Highway 20
